String.string: Time to pacify the Bastion of Lok!
Report to Isla at the entrance of Bestial Vale.
Find Ausdan near the bastion in northeastern Oblivion Woods.

Infiltrate the Bastion of Lok via teleportal and meet with agent Grapine.
(Only normal mode will advance quests.)

Eliminate Soulcrusher and open the door to the secret passage.
(Only normal mode will advance quests.)

Eliminate Demonbinder Murdranak and his bloodbound vulcan.
(Only normal mode will advance quests.)
Report to Primus Hendry at the Vanguard Outpost.
